title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When setting the display property of an item to 'none' in the properties view of the new PDF emitter, the item does not disappear as expected in the preview.
EB: Expected behavior: The label should disappear when the display property is set to 'none'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the document.
2. Open the 'properties' view.
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to 'none'.
4. Generate a PDF preview and observe that the label is still visible.
